thread.title: Alabama Instagram accounts you should follow if you love decor, design and DIY
thread.title_full: Alabama Instagram accounts you should follow if you love decor, design and DIY

author: Sara Frye | sfrye@al.com
title: Alabama Instagram accounts you should follow if you love decor, design and DIY
text:
Joined Instagram: 2011 
Based in: Birmingham, AL 
Describe your account to new followers: "I like to create an Instagram feed that will act as a business card for people to see when they come to my profile. I want them to know that I make vintage architecturally inspired jewelry, that I love to create new spaces using architectural salvage pieces and I'm a mom and wife of a fun, busy and adventurous family." 
Advice for people who want to have a successful Instagram: "If you want to have a successful Instagram account I believe the most important thing is to have good, pleasing to the eye pictures. You need to create your feed with intention. Does it portray your style? Does it show your followers what you are selling without being too sales pitch driven? Instagram should tell a story about what you are interested in. Your feed is all about visual inspiration." 
--- 
When we asked our readers about the best Instagram accounts in Alabama, we expected to get a handful of suggestions. Instead we received hundreds! We reached out to the best of the best and asked them about their accounts, and over the next two weeks, we'll highlight these accounts in a series of stories. You can see all of the accounts suggested by our readers here: A photo posted by AL.com (@aldotcompix) on Aug 19, 2015 at 2:14pm PDT
